content: albiera « frost » in occitan are a snowy pair of convertible mittens it starts with a delicate twisting ribbing detail on the cuffs that is mirrored inside the wrist and merges into a fun chunky cable that blends in the simple stockinette a thumb gusset is worked to the side for a comfortable fit the stitches are put on hold and picked up later to finish it the pattern provides instructions on how to make these mittens convertible so that the round top of the mitten is detachable and lets you use your fingers it features a detailed video tutorial and step by step indications that will allow you to make any mittens convertible in the future albiera comes in three different sizes each of them charted worked in dk weight it s a quick and accessible project for an adventurous or intermediate knitter **yarn ** you will need 180 m 196 yds of dk weight yarn sample was knit with snaeldan 3ply in cream white **needles ** 3 75 mm us 5 needles 3 25 mm us 3 needles for the convertible ribbing part or sizes required to get the right gauge **gauge ** 22 st x 32 rounds per 10 cm 4 in stockinette stitch after blocking **sizes ** 1 2 / 3 finished circumference 18 20 / 22 cm 7 7 ¾ / 8 ½ finished length from cuff to top about 25 cm 9 ¾ adjustable finished length from thumb position to top about 12 cm 4 ¾ adjustable measure your hand at its widest point under the fingers for a comfortable fit make a size with up to 3 cm 1 ¼ positive ease for a snugger fit you can get closer to your actual measurements note for the length you will be able to knit a longer or shorter mitten as needed pattern provides indications to know when to start the decreases at the top **notions ** tapestry needle and scissors stitch markers scrap yarn to place thumb stitches on hold and a contrasting piece for the convertible part cable needle optional row counter recommended **techniques used ** twisted ribbing left and right twist cables with purl center video tutorial provided thumb gusset with simple increases rounded mitten with simple decreases « afterthought » convertible mittens video tutorial provided texture is charted only --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- albiera « gelée » en occitan est une paire de moufles convertibles hivernales elles commencent avec un détail de côtes torses délicat qui est en miroir à l intérieur du poignet et se fond dans une torsade ronde au creux du jersey on forme un gousset pour le pouce sur le côté pour une coupe plus confortable les mailles sont mises en attente et relevées plus tard pour le terminer le patron contient des instructions pour rendre ces moufles convertibles le haut rond de la moufle est détachable et vous laisse utiliser vos doigts il comprend un tutoriel vidéo détaillé et des indications étape par étape qui vous permettront
